summary: A documentary that explores the world of U.S. television showrunners and the creative forces aligned around them.
cast: J.J. Abrams|Kristen Bell|David Boreanaz|Matthew Carnahan|Steven S. DeKnight|Emily Deschanel|Chris Downey|Jane Espenson|Hart Hanson|Helen Hunt|Joshua Jackson|Mike Kelley|Michelle King|Robert King|Mark Kubr|Anthony LaPaglia|Lucy Lawless|Ali LeRoi|Damon Lindelof|Jeff Melvoin|Ronald D. Moore|David Nevins|Jonathan Nolan|Jason O'Mara|Jeff Pinkner|Greg Plageman|Bill Prady|John Rogers|Ray Romano|Mike Royce|Shawn Ryan|Jonathan Schwartz|Kurt Sutter|Janet Tamaro|Paul Wagner|Jed Whedon|Joss Whedon|Terence Winter|Michael Wright|J.H. Wyman|Don Cheadle|John Noble
title: Showrunners
